Posts.Content: lisacp wrote: Hi ladies, I had surgery 4 weeks ago. My onc ordered an Oncotype test. there was a slight delay in sending the tissue - first time I felt really frustrated since dx. Anyway, I'm wondering how long I have to make a decision if I am in an intermediate range Oncotype score. My onc office seems to think they will have the results thurs or Fri and I have a second opinion appointment next Wed. Lisa Log in to post a reply
